item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, April 1, 2025 at 1:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Marine Le Pen banned from standing for office for five years
2. US stocks post worst quarter since 2022 as tariff worries swirl
3. Trump says he is ‘not joking’ about seeking a third term in office
4. The people vs Musk: billionaire transforms Wisconsin court contest
5. [Opinion] Lessons from Russia, Turkey and India for Trump’s America
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, April 1, 2025 at 1:25 AM UTC
